headline: Darden Restaurants to Host Fiscal 2025 Fourth Quarter Conference Call on June 20
summary: Darden Restaurants, Inc., (NYSE: DRI) plans to release its fiscal 2025 fourth quarter financial results before the market opens on Friday, June 20, 2025, with a conference call to follow at 8:30 am ET. Rick Cardenas, CEO, and other senior management will discuss fourth quarter results and conduct a question and answer session. For those who cannot listen to the live broadcast, a replay will be available shortly after the call.

headline: Darden Restaurants, Inc.: Overvalued, Wait For A Better Price
summary: Discover why DRI is rated a hold despite revenue growth. Explore valuation, debt concerns, and potential growth through innovation and acquisitions.

headline: Brinker International (NYSE:EAT): Strongest Q1 Results from the Sit-Down Dining Group
summary: Let’s dig into the relative performance of Brinker International (NYSE:EAT) and its peers as we unravel the now-completed Q1 sit-down dining earnings season.
